channel.title: Help with something I think is HTML based
channel.description: how do u make links like http://www.yahoo.com be like , Click here to go to yahoo...? I know there's this HTML extension that SAYS it does this the code is : [code]Click here to go to yahoo. [/code] But i've used this code in different forums and it never worked, so if someone can help, thanks.

item.title: Help with something I think is HTML based
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

In BBcode?

[ url=http://yahoo.com]click here[ /url]

item.title: Help with something I think is HTML based
item.dc:creator: @hikzero3 hikzero3
item.description:
@hikzero3 wrote:

how do u make links like http://www.yahoo.com

be like ,

Click here to go to yahoo…?

I know there’s this HTML extension that SAYS it does this the code is :

Click <a href="http://www.yahoo.com">here</a> to go to yahoo.

But i’ve used this code in different forums and it never worked, so if someone can help, thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with something I think is HTML based
